comments:
When attempting to uninstall the samples through the manage configuration dialog
the workbench hangs and has to be killed. This is occuring in RC2

Steps to Reproduce (when samples are already installed):

1. Click Help -> Software Updates -> Manage Configuration...
2. Expand file:/<eclipse install> and select Eclpise SDK Samples
3. Click Uninstall in the information area
4. Click Ok on the next two dialogs

The workbench hangs at this point and the process has to be killed. The
following stack trace is in the .log file

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Jun 15, 2004 09:32:48.104

Two other stack traces occure after this all within milliseconds of each other,
If need by I can add them to the bug but you should be able to see them when you
reproduce the problem. I have reproduced this multiple times on my machine and
on a colleagues machine aswell.

Dup of bug 66773.
The problem appears to be caused by restarting the workbench. The feature 
should have already been uninstalled by the time you selected restart.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 66773 ***
Tested in RC3 and it now works.
